TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public MustInherit Class BaseProperty Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示 屬性。

span.span: Represents a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這表示結構描述資訊 （名稱、 允許值等等） 的屬性。This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a property. 因為這是只要結構描述資訊時，沒有任何欄位，例如 「 值 」，取得或設定這個屬性的值。Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. 如果您以手動方式具現化這個類別，呼叫設定第一個物件的屬性之前和設定的最後一個屬性之後。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 預設建構函式。

span.span: Default constructor.

summary.span: 從永續性格式進行還原序列化的必要項。

span.span: Required for deserializtion from a persisted format.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性的引數清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of arguments for this property.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性的引數清單。

span.span: Returns the list of arguments for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此為選擇性欄位。This field is optional.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Category { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性所屬之類別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性所屬之類別的名稱。

span.span: Returns the name of the category to which this property belongs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個欄位的值不符`Name`屬性定義中包含的項目類別，預設值，具有這個名稱會自動產生並新增至包含類別。If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a element that is defined in the containing class, a default that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing class. 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是文化特性而異。This field is optional and is culture-invariant. 若未指定此欄位，這個屬性會新增至名為一般 （已當地語系化） 自動產生類別。When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). 這個欄位不能設定為空字串。This field cannot be set to the empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingRule As Rule

summary.span: 取得或設定包含這個 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that contains this .

value.span: 傳回含有這個 的規則。

span.span: Returns the rule that contains this .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ DataSource { Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存這個屬性之目前值的資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source where the current value of this property is stored.

value.span: 傳回儲存這個屬性之目前值的資料來源。

span.span: Returns the data source where the current value of this property is stored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料來源定義，它會覆寫上包含的屬性。If the data source is defined, it overrides the property on the containing . 此為必要欄位只有當父沒有初始化資料來源。This field is mandatory only if the parent does not have the data source initialized. 這個屬性的 getter 只會傳回上直接設定執行個體。The getter for this property returns only the that is set directly on this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Default { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性的預設值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value for this property.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性的預設值。

span.span: Returns the default value for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此為選擇性欄位。This field is optional. 如果值為，語意會判斷此欄位是否會區分文化特性。If the value is a , semantics determine whether this field is culture-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的描述，供潛在 UI 用戶端使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of this for use by a prospective UI client.

value.span: 傳回這個 的描述。

span.span: Returns the description of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是區分文化特性。This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定潛在 UI 用戶端可以用來顯示這個 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this .

value.span: 傳回這個 的顯示名稱。

span.span: Returns the display name of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是區分文化特性。This field is optional and is culture-sensitive. 如果未設定這個屬性，它被指派相同的值屬性 （和，因此，不會當地語系化）。When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the property (and, therefore, would not be localized).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ F1Keyword { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定關鍵字，這個關鍵字用來開啟這個屬性的說明頁。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.

value.span: 傳回關鍵字，這個關鍵字用來開啟這個屬性的說明頁。

span.span: Returns the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這種形式的指定說明的優先順序高於和 + 。This form of specifying help takes precedence over and + . 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是不區分文化特性。This field is optional and is culture insensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HelpContext { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者按下 F1 鍵時所使用的說明主題。

span.span: Gets or sets the Help context to use when the user presses F1.

value.span: 傳回使用者按下 F1 鍵時所使用的說明主題。

span.span: Returns the Help context to use when the user presses F1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會使用屬性來顯示指定的說明檔的說明內容。This property uses the property to display the Help context of the specified Help file. 此為選擇性欄位。This field is optional. 如果這個屬性連同，指定的值會被忽略。If this property, together with , is specified, then the value of is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HelpFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者按下 F1 鍵時所使用的說明檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the Help file to use when the user presses F1.

value.span: 傳回使用者按下 F1 鍵時所使用的說明檔。

span.span: Returns the Help file to use when the user presses F1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是不區分文化特性。This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HelpUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性之 [說明] 頁面的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the Help page for this property.

summary.span: 當使用者按下 F1 鍵時，會開啟這個頁面。

span.span: The page is opened when the user presses F1.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性之 [說明] 頁面的 URL。

span.span: Returns the URL of the Help page for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的優先順序高於 + 屬性。This property has a higher priority than the + properties. 換句話說，這些屬性會忽略如果設定。In other words, these properties are ignored if is set. 這個欄位是選擇性，而且是不區分文化特性。This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeInCommandLine { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定命令列建構函式是否在命令列中併入這個屬性的提示。

span.span: Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.

value.span: 傳回命令列建構函式的提示。

span.span: Returns the hint to the command-line constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些屬性只能由目標，並不是要包含在命令列中。Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. 其他屬性，例如，工作參數會包含在它們發出參數/值的表單中的命令列。Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. 此欄位會是選擇性的且根據預設，具有值`true`。This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示此屬性是否需要設定值。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.

value.span: 傳回旗標，這個旗標表示此屬性是否需要設定值。

span.span: Returns a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Metadata As List(Of NameValuePair)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::NameValuePair ^> ^ Metadata { System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::NameValuePair ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::NameValuePair ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的其他屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets additional attributes of this .

value.span: 傳回這個 的其他屬性。

span.span: Returns additional attributes of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這可以用於當做抓取包主要欄位不會擷取這個屬性的其他中繼資料。This can be used as a grab bag for additional metadata of this property that are not captured by the primary fields. 使用自訂的 UI 來解譯的其他中繼資料，因為已出貨的 UI 格式並不知道這些屬性。Use custom UI to interpret the additional metadata because the shipped UI formats are not aware of these attributes. 此為選擇性欄位。This field is optional.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MultipleValuesAllowed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數，這個參數指定這個屬性是否允許同時提供/選取多個值。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.

value.span: 傳回參數，這個參數指定這個屬性是否允許同時提供/選取多個值。

span.span: Returns a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.

value.span: 如果為 true，則可以選取多個值。

span.span: If true, multiple values may be selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this .

value.span: 傳回這個 的名稱。

span.span: Returns the name of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位是強制性和文化特性而異。This field is mandatory and culture-invariant. 這個欄位的值無法設定為空字串。The value of this field cannot be set to the empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示此屬性是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is read-only.

value.span: 如果這是唯讀屬性則傳回 ，否則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if this is a read-only property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是選擇性欄位，其預設值是`false`。This field is optional and its default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Separator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來區隔參數與其值的語彙基元。

span.span: Gets or sets the token used to separate a switch from its value.

value.span: 傳回用來區隔參數與其值的語彙基元。

span.span: Returns the token used to separate a switch from its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此處指定的值會覆寫指定的父系規則分隔符號的值。The value specified here overrides the value specified for the parent rule separator. 這個欄位是選擇性的不因文化特性而異。This field is optional and culture-invariant.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Subcategory { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the subcategory this property belongs to.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性所屬的子類別。

span.span: Returns the subcategory this property belongs to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Switch { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性在表示工具參數時的參數表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the switch representation of this property when the property represents a tool parameter.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性的參數表示。

span.span: Returns the switch representation of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位是選擇性的不因文化特性而異。This field is optional and culture-invariant.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SwitchPrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性在表示工具參數時之參數表示的前置字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix for the switch representation of this property when this property represents a tool parameter.

value.span: 傳回這個屬性之參數表示的前置字元。

span.span: Returns the prefix for the switch representation of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此處指定的值會覆寫指定的值的父代。The value specified here overrides the value specified for the of the parent . 這個欄位是選擇性的不因文化特性而異。This field is optional and culture-invariant.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定告知 UI 用戶端是否顯示這個屬性的提示。

span.span: Gets or sets a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.

value.span: 傳回告知 UI 用戶端是否顯示這個屬性的提示。

span.span: Returns a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位是選擇性的且具有預設值`true`。This field is optional and has the default value `true`.
